step.tex: \begin{align} \int \dfrac{2 - 3\sin x}{\cos^2 x}\,dx &= \int \left(\dfrac{2}{\cos^2 x} - 3\dfrac{\sin x}{\cos^2 x}\right)dx\\ &= \int \left(2\sec^2 x - \sec x \cdot\tan x \right)dx\\ &= 2\int \sec^2 x\,dx - \int \sec x \cdot\tan x \,dx \\ &= 2 \tan x - \sec x + C \end{align}\\ \text{Here, C is the constant of integration.}
